summary: A young boy receives a rocking horse for Christmas and soon learns that he is able to pick the winning horse at the races.
cast: Valerie Hobson|John Howard Davies|Ronald Squire|John Mills|Hugh Sinclair|Charles Goldner|Susan Richards|Cyril Smith|Anthony Holles|Melanie Mackenzie|Michael Ripper|Johnnie Schofield|Caroline Steer
title: The Rocking Horse Winner
